Xeon processors, RAID 1 HDD, 3 cores (more if you want), Anti-DDoS mitigation, OpenVZ, lifted & improved version of Stallion (jk SolusVM, calm down), TUN/TAP and lots of OS to choose from. Extra IPs are $12 / year. No mass mailing please. Test IP = 192.99.39.45.

$3.33 for every plan if you would prefer to pay monthly. PayPal and BitPay with a 7 day money back guarantee.

Thanks for your interest.
